title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI. Somehow I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When I choose SWT.MULTI in ControlExampleText, I don't hear any sound.
EB: When I choose SWT.MULTI in ControlExampleText, I hear a Windows 'ding' sound, indicating that I did something wrong.
SR: ControlExampleText should not produce a beep sound when choosing SWT.MULTI. It should behave correctly without any unexpected sound effects.
